    • Method Detail

      • fromAlert

        public static ArrayList<CustomsAlert> fromAlert(Alert a)
        Convert an Alert into one or more instances of CustomsAlert

        This method will convert an alert that has been generated by the customs pipeline into one or more CustomsAlert objects which can then be submitted directly to the FxA service.

        This method contains special handling for the various types of alert messages that can be generated by the Customs pipeline

        Parameters:
        a - Alert
        Returns:
        ArrayList of CustomsAlert, or null if conversion was not possible

      • convertSourceLoginFailure

        public static ArrayList<CustomsAlert> convertSourceLoginFailure(Alert a)
        Convert source login failure alert into a list of customs alerts.
        Parameters:
        a - Alert to convert
        Returns:
        ArrayList of CustomsAlert created

        public static ArrayList<CustomsAlert> convertSourceLoginFailureDist(Alert a)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        ArrayList of CustomsAlert created

      • convertAccountCreationAbuse

        public static ArrayList<CustomsAlert> convertAccountCreationAbuse(Alert a)
        Convert an account creation abuse alert

        The IP address will be noted as suspected, in addition to the accounts that have been created.

        Parameters:
        a - Alert
        Returns:
        ArrayList of CustomsAlert

      • convertAccountCreationAbuseDistributed

        public static ArrayList<CustomsAlert> convertAccountCreationAbuseDistributed(Alert a)
        Convert an account creation abuse distributed alert

        The IP address will be noted as suspected, in addition to the account in the alert.

        Parameters:
        a - Alert
        Returns:
        ArrayList of CustomsAlert
